ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name = 'PB Agent', $Profile.Name = 'PB Sales Management', $Profile.Name = 'PB Call Center Admin', $Profile.Name = 'PB Call Center Executive', $Profile.Name = 'PB Call Center Admin' ) , ISCHANGED( MobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Phone ), ISCHANGED( Email ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to modify: MobilePhone, Phone and email
